author: skitching
msg: Allow a null value for the "dst" el-expression in a call-return. This allows the caller to ignore return values.

author: ate
msg: - some further cleanup of the JAXB based Portlet API descriptor model classes
- adding convenient methods for direct access to individual elements from collections, e.g. app.getPortletDefintion(portletName), or .getDescription(locale)
- dropping all *xml* element only attribute accessors: those really have no functional meaning in the object model
- PortletApplicationDefinition id attribute usage within the Pluto core will be replaced with name usage shortly too

author: sisbell
msg: Fix: IT0469 - Rule: join configs of build/plugins/plugin and reporting/plugins/plugin.

author: brett
msg: remove EOL'd line of dev - tags still exist
